markdownRemark.html:
A seized bearing exploded & ruined a new wheel I installed on my boosted board a couple weeks back.

Street heat melted the innards of my newly installed Orangatang Caguma 85mm 83a wheel. Luckily I was coming to a stop when it fell off; could have been a nasty wipe out. from r/boostedboards

frontmatter.title: A seized bearing exploded & ruined my new wheel
